import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ng-switch-example', templateUrl: './ng-switch-example.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ng-switch-example.component.css'] }) export class NgSwitchExampleComponent { orderStatus:string="delivered"; updateStatus(status:string){ this.orderStatus = status; } }
